rioko.events.listeners

Class AbstractListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • rioko.events.listeners.AbstractListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Listener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDataChangeListener

    public abstract class AbstractListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Listener
    Abstract class representing a general listener of the custom events developed in this package. It has information about the object which want to listen something.
    Author:
    Antonio

      • destroyListener

        public static void destroyListener(AbstractListener listener)

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends AbstractEvent> getAssociatedEvent()

        Returns:
